course.title: CSI 4141 Real Time Systems Design (3 units)
course.desc: Definition of real-time systems; examples. Characteristics of real-time systems. Analysis frameworks and tools. Elements of real-time system structure. Reliability and fault tolerance. Exceptions and exception handling. Concurrency and concurrent programming in real-time systems. Synchronisation and communication, resource control, and scheduling in real-time systems. Real-time system design methodologies. Computer assisted design of real-time systems.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, TutorialPrerequisite: CSI 3131. Also offered as CEG 4166.
